title: Connectors do not bind to their ports in Catalina.load(), but only later in start()
description: Testing with trunk at revision 957942, thus this issue supposedly affects Tomcat 7.0.0 as well. In Tomcat 6, there is a separate prestartup phase when starting Tomcat, allowing Connectors to bind to their ports before other parts of Tomcat are started. However, this feature seems to be broken in the fix for BZ 48625. The issue can be reproduced by following these steps: 1. Start the first instance successfully.
OB: The Connectors do not bind to their ports in Catalina.load().
EB: The Connectors should bind to their ports in Catalina.load().
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Start two Tomcat instances with the same configuration at the same time. Additionally, add the following line to conf/catalina.properties: org.apache.catalina.startup.EXITONINITFAILURE=true.
